entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Yoho (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yoho National Park 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: WSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
